title: Product Lead, Verification and Identity Platform
content:
Who we are
About Stripe
Stripe is a financial infrastructure platform for businesses. Millions of companies—from the world’s largest enterprises to the most ambitious startups—use Stripe to accept payments, grow their revenue, and accelerate new business opportunities. Our mission is to increase the GDP of the internet, and we have a staggering amount of work ahead. That means you have an unprecedented opportunity to put the global economy within everyone’s reach while doing the most important work of your career.
About the team
The Verification & Identity Platform (VIP) team is a core platform team which powers user onboarding & verification (KYC & KYB) worldwide & ensures continued compliance throughout the user life-cycle at Stripe. Our team safeguards user identities across our products by creating a secure and user-centric identification and verification system. We leverage an in-house technology ecosystem, which integrates with various data verification services and regulatory bodies, ensuring swift and accurate account verification, thereby bolstering Stripe's regulatory compliance.
What you’ll do
Responsibilities

Be a well-rounded product leader -- Define the long term strategy and roadmap for the Verifications and Identity platform.
Hire and grow a team of passionate product managers
Drive product design and prioritization decisions across directly managed teams, and work closely with teams across Stripe’s product portfolio 
Be accountable for product roadmaps, resource allocation, and release cadence 
Be an evangelist for your product movement across the company

Who you are
We’re looking for someone who meets the minimum requirements to be considered for the role. If you meet these requirements, you are encouraged to apply. The preferred qualifications are a bonus, not a requirement.
Minimum requirements

10+ years in Product Management, with experience in building platform products and in serving both internal and external customers/stakeholders
Experience managing technical software products from kick-off to ship
Consistent track record of leading ambitious products and 0-to-1 projects
Strong stakeholder management including navigating difficult situations, negotiating timelines, and influencing internal and external stakeholders across organizations and borders
Strong communications skills - you can summarize and express complex requirements in an accessible and precise manner

Preferred qualifications

Preferably has experience with B2B SaaS
Preferably has experience with compliance and regulation in financial services
Experience working on an infrastructure platform team

questions.description: Stripe is currently operating in a hybrid work environment. In-office expectations for office-assigned Stripes vary by team. A remote location, in most cases, is defined as living 50 miles or more from an office location. While you would be welcome to join the office for team or business meetings when necessary, the expectation would be that you would regularly work from home rather than a Stripe office location. Stripe offices are located in Amsterdam, Bangkok, Bengaluru, Berlin, Chicago, Dubai, Dublin, Jakarta, London, Madrid, Mexico City, New York City, Paris, São Paulo, Singapore, South San Francisco, Seattle, Tokyo, and Toronto. Stripe does not cover the cost of relocating to a remote location. We encourage you to apply for roles that match the location in which you live or have intentions to live.
